summary: Adds a purchasable copy of the Golden Claw to the Riverwood Trader.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

Hello everybody! This little mod adds a replica of the Golden Claw to Mr. Valerius' inventory that you can buy without worry. It's not marked as a quest item, and of course it doesn't count as stolen, so feel free to drop it somewhere in your house as a nice memento of your adventures!

Do you feel there is something missing from your Dragon Claw collection? Do you want to keep a nice souvenir of your first big quest, but don't feel like having to STEAL it unless you marry the owner's sister? Now you can, and it's cheap, too! (Maybe it's just gold-plated iron, rather than actual gold...)

I'm not sure if this mod will conflict with other mods that add items to the Riverwood Trader. Do let me know - in that case I'll make it available for free somehow. Golden Claws for everyone!

[u][b]Notes[/b][/u]
I originally made this mod for the Steam Workshop. Link [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=112545710]here[/url]. To install, place the files in your 'Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Or use your mod manager of choice to install the mod automatically. Have fun!

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
